titles.title: To redesignate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 2777 Logan Avenue in San Diego, California, as the "Cesar E. Chavez Post Office".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 2/27/2003--Introduced. Designates the U.S. Postal Service facility (the Southeastern Post Office) located at 2777 Logan Avenue in San Diego, California, as the Cesar E. Chavez Post Office.
